contents.text: Welcome to Quantcast in San Francisco, powering your brand’s growth in the AI era.
For information about our AI-powered marketing platform and services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an audience measurement specialist.

navigationGoals: Discuss our audience measurement needs with a specialist
I need to set up audience measurement for my nonprofit’s website to track veteran outreach traffic.
Integrate Quantcast’s audience measurement SDK into my site and review its analytics capabilities
I need to speak with someone about how you measure my website’s audience traffic.
I need to review audience measurement data to analyze traffic patterns for my physics research website.

contents.text: To schedule a demo of our marketing intelligence platform, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo scheduling team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo of the AI marketing intelligence platform
I want to schedule a demo of the marketing intelligence platform to see how it can help promote my veteran-support initiative.
Schedule a live demo of the Quantcast marketing intelligence platform
I want to set up a demo of your marketing intelligence platform.
I'd like to schedule a demo of your AI-driven marketing intelligence platform to assess its features.

contents.text: For customer support and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Get technical support for an integration issue
I’m having trouble accessing my Quantcast dashboard and need technical support to resolve it.
Troubleshoot an API integration error with Quantcast’s technical support
I’m having trouble with the technical side of your AI marketing tools and need help.
I'm encountering an error with the API integration and need technical support to resolve it.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing question and update account details
I need to clarify some unexpected charges on my account and update my billing information.
Retrieve my latest invoice and update my billing details for my Quantcast account
I have questions about my billing statement and account details.
I need assistance understanding my recent invoice and updating my billing details.
